title: Paris Neighborhood Becomes Breeding Ground For Militant Jihadists
teaser: A section of Paris, which is known for its picturesque parks and artistic community, was also home to the gunmen in last week's terror attack. Renee Montagne talks to Myriam Benraad, a French scholar.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
